author: freakboy3742
message:
Ensure that L10N formats aren't cached between tests.

git-svn-id: http://code.djangoproject.com/svn/django/trunk@15461 bcc190cf-cafb-0310-a4f2-bffc1f526a37

files.patch:
@@ -2618,6 +2618,7 @@ def setUp(self):
     def tearDown(self):
         settings.USE_THOUSAND_SEPARATOR = self.old_USE_THOUSAND_SEPARATOR
         settings.USE_L10N = self.old_USE_L10N
+        formats.reset_format_cache()
 
     def assert_non_localized_year(self, response, year):
         """Ensure that the year is not localized with
